LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.PressXtoCopyToClipboar: Press 'Control + C' to copy the ModList to the clipboard.

LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.DifferentBuild: Different game build. Current build is {2}, but {0} specifies build {1} as target version.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.UpdateAvailable: An update is available to version {1} (current: {0}).
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.MissingMod: {0} (id: {1}) is not installed, and will be ignored.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.CoreNotFirst: 'Core' should be the first mod loaded.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.DependencyUnknownVersi: Depends on {0}, but its version is unknown.

LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.DependencyWrongVersion: Depends on {0} version {1}, version {2} is loaded.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.DependencyNotActive: Depends on {0}, which is not active.

LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.GetMoreMods_SteamWorks: Get more mods from the Steam Workshop

LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.SteamWorkshop.UnSubscr: Unsubscribe from this mod on the Steam Workshop
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.SteamWorkshop.MassUnSu: Mass unsubscribe inactive/outdated/all Steam Workshop mods
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.IO.MassRemoveLocal: Mass remove inactive, outdated or all local copies
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.ModListsTip: Create, apply and manage mod lists.\n\nMod Lists allow you to quickly switch sets of mods.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.ResetMods: Reset active modlist to a blank modlist
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.ConfirmResetMods: Are you sure?\n\nThis will de-activate your entire modlist. Make sure to export it first if you want to save your mod order.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.SortFailed.CyclicDepen: Cannot auto-sort mod list; {0} and {1} depend on eachother.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.InvalidName: {0} is not a valid name. The name may not contain any of these characters: {1}.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.ModListExists: {0} already exists. Please use a different name, or delete or rename the existing modlist.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.NameTooShort: Mod list must have a name.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.ConfirmOverwriteModLis: A ModList named '{0}' already exists. Are you sure want to overwrite it?
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.FailedToCreateModListF: Failed to import mod list from clipboard: {0}.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.AddToModList: Add mod to a mod list
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.RemoveFromModList: Remove mod from a mod list
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.CreateLocalCopies: Create local copies of all Steam mods in your active mod list\n\nLocal copies will be stored in the mods folder, and will not get automatic updates.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.CreateLocalCopiesConfi: You are about to create local copies of {0} mods. This may take several minutes. Are you sure you want to proceed?
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.CreateLocalCopy: Create a local copy of {0}\n\nLocal copies will be stored in the mods folder, and will not get automatic updates.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.CreateLocalSucceeded: Succesfully created a local copy of {0}
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.CreateLocalFailed: Failed to create a local copy of {0}. See the error log for details. You may want to inspect your mods folder to delete partially copied mods.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.DeleteLocalCopy: Delete the currently selected version of {0}\n\nWARNING: This is irreversible!
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.ConfirmRemoveLocal: Are you sure you want to permanently delete this version of {0}?
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.RemoveLocalFailed: Failed to remove local copy of {0}. See the error log for details. You may want to inspect your mods folder to delete any partially deleted mods.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.MoveCoreToFirst: Set 'Core' to the first position in the load order.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.NoMatchingModInstalled: No installed mods found matching "{0}" for game version {1}.
No installed mods found matching "{0} {3} {2}" for game version {1}.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.UpdateLocalCopy: Update {0} to the current Steam Workshop version.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.DialogConfirmIssues: You may want to resolve these issues before loading/starting a new game.\n\n{1}
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.DialogConfirmIssuesCri: \n\nWARNING: Using this mod list is likely going to cause errors, and may crash the game!
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.ManifestNotImplemented: This mod has no manifest, or doesn't implement version checking.\n\nYou should tell the author that this is really easy to do!
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.NewVersionAvailable: A new version is available! Current: {0}, latest: {1}.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.SubscribeAllMissing: Subscribe to all missing Workshop mods.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.ChangeModColour: Change colour for this version of {0} only
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.ChangeButtonColour: Change colour for all versions of {0}
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.ShowPromotionsTip: If enabled, whenever you select a Steam Workshop mod, Mod Manager will show promotions for other mods by the same author.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.TrimTagsTip: If enabled, author and version tags will be removed from mod names (e.g. [KV], [B19])
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.TrimVersionStrings: Remove version numbers from mod names
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.TrimVersionStringsTip: If enabled, Mod Manager will attempt to remove version string from mod names (e.g. 1.0, 0.19)\n\nWARNING: This may remove too much information!
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.ShowAllRequirementsTip: Show all met and unmet mod requirements in the mod details
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.AddModManagerToNewModL: Add Mod Manager to new modlists
Add Mod Manager to new modlists whenever the modlist is reset.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.AddHugsLibToNewModList: Add HugsLib to new modlists whenever the modlist is reset.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.AddExpansionsToNewModL: Add official expansions to new modlists
Add official expansions to new modlists whenever the modlist is reset.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ModManager.ShowVersionChecksForSt: Show version checks for steam mods.

Version checks are most useful for manually installed mods, so are disabled for steam mods by default. Note that this will only notify about newer manually installed mods where the author has explicitly supported this functionality. It will not notify about new steam mods.
